Step2.Description: The attacker identifies a potential command injection vulnerability in the 'text' parameter of the application.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker aims to achieve remote code execution on the server by injecting malicious commands.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker injects the payload '; ls #', which lists files in the directory.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully lists files on the server, confirming the command injection vulnerability.
